name: hillebrandgorieshipping
description: This project is a WooCommerce plugin to calculate the shipping costs using the eShipping API and create an order in the eShipping system.

scripts.watch: npx wp-scripts start fills/orderRecapFill.js fills/shippingRatesFill.js react/components.js --source-path=assets/js --output-path=dist
scripts.build: npx wp-scripts build fills/orderRecapFill.js fills/shippingRatesFill.js react/components.js --source-path=assets/js --output-path=dist
scripts.make-pot: php -d memory_limit=512M $(which wp) i18n make-pot . languages/hges.pot --include=src,js --exclude=node_modules,vendor,build,dist
scripts.make-pot-twig: mkdir -p tmp-twig && find templates -name '*.twig' -exec sh -c 'cat "$1" | sed "s/{{\s*/<?php /g; s/\s*}}/; ?>/g" > tmp-twig/$(basename "$1" .twig).php' _ {} \; && xgettext --from-code=UTF-8 --language=PHP --keyword=__ --output=languages/twig-temp.pot tmp-twig/*.php && msgcat --use-first languages/hges.pot languages/twig-temp.pot -o languages/hges.pot && rm -rf tmp-twig languages/twig-temp.pot
scripts.make-pot-js: find assets -name '*.js' -exec cat {} + | xgettext --from-code=UTF-8 --language=JavaScript --keyword=__ --keyword=_n:1,2 --keyword=_x:1,2c --output=languages/js-temp.pot - && msgcat --use-first languages/hges.pot languages/js-temp.pot -o languages/hges.pot && rm languages/js-temp.pot
